text:
*Soapbox is hiring a Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Soapbox is a collaboration app for people leaders who share our belief that good communication between the manager and employee is the most important factor in the success and motivation of their team.

This individual will be the second full-time hire on the marketing team. That means that you’ll have a lot of opportunities to grow as a marketer, earn ownership of different parts of the marketing mix, and focus on the things that give you energy.

We're looking for someone who has 1-3+ years of content marketing experience, is a great writer, and has a strong understanding of SEO fundamentals. 

**If you do not have the exact experience for this position but are close, please apply! We are not looking for people to “fit” our company – we are looking for people to add to and enhance our company through different perspectives, viewpoints, and backgrounds.

This is a remote position.

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3rK0qM1>

<@U010JU2GTND>
